results.description: The ICC lifts its three-month suspension of Zimbabwe for political interference and reinstates them as a member.

results.description: Zimbabwe's first black cricketer Henry Olonga, who was forced to flee the country after protesting against Robert Mugabe, says he takes "no pleasure" from ex-president's death.
results.title: Robert Mugabe: Henry Olonga takes 'no pleasure' from ex-president's death

results.description: The International Cricket Council (ICC) suspends Zimbabwe for failing to ensure there is no government interference in its running of the game.
results.title: ICC suspend Zimbabwe Cricket for political interference

results.description: Ireland beat Zimbabwe by six wickets in Belfast to win the one-day international series 3-0.

results.description: Ireland clinch the ODI series gainst Zimbabwe as James McCollum's 73 and Tim Murtagh's five wickets help secure a five-run win at Stormont.
